author: PlayStation
description:
Bounties, clue cards, and a wolf ally are all part of Atsu’s journey for vengeance in Ghost of Yōtei, out October 2 on PS5.
 
Catch up on the new details from today’s State of Play at PlayStation.Blog
title: Ghost of Yōtei hits PS5 October 2, join Atsu’s revenge quest

author: PlayStation
description: Head to PlayStation.Blog for full details on these two intricate console and DualSense controller designs that honor the beauty of Japanese tradition.
title: Just revealed: two Ghost of Yōtei Limited Edition Bundles for PS5

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/ps5/ghost-of-yotei-limited-edition-ps5-bundle-and-accessories/

Explore every inch of the breathtaking lands surrounding Mount Yōtei with the PlayStation®5 Console – Ghost of Yōtei Limited Edition Bundles.
Experience Atsu’s epic tale as it unfolds across a stunning Japanese landscape on hardware and accessories inspired by the game.
These bundles include a PS5 console with Limited Edition console covers, a Limited Edition DualSense wireless controller, a voucher for a digital copy of the game, and pre-order incentive items.(1) 
Ghost of Yōtei accessories can also be purchased separately(2), including the DualSense® Wireless Controllers - Ghost of Yōtei™ Limited Edition and Ghost of Yōtei™ Gold Limited Edition Console Covers for PS5(3) and PS5 Pro(4) consoles.

Learn more at: https://www.playstation.com/en-us/ps5/ghost-of-yotei-limited-edition-ps5-bundle-and-accessories/

1Available via voucher code. Account for PlayStation™Network and internet connect
title: Ghost of Yōtei - Limited Edition PS5 Bundles & Accessories

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10012470

Available now on PlayStation 5

The next chapter in the beloved minimalist city-building franchise is here. ISLANDERS: New Shores invites you back to a world of tranquil creativity, now reimagined with expanded gameplay, stunning visuals, and a host of fresh features that build on the charm of the original.

Whether you're a longtime fan or a newcomer, prepare to explore, build, and strategize like never before.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Islanders: New Shores - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/search/borderlands%204

It's high time we formally introduced you to Vex the Siren, one of the four all-new Vault Hunters who are wreaking havoc on Kairos in Borderlands 4!

If you're generally a fan of companion classes or like to rack up kills with elemental damage, Vex is a great choice.

We’ll be rolling out a Gameplay Overview, Character Short, and Vault Hunter page for Rafa, Amon, and Harlowe in the coming weeks – so stay tuned!

Borderlands 4 is now available for pre-order on PlayStation®5.

--------------------------------------------

Borderlands 4 is a mayhem-fueled looter shooter, jam-packed with billions of weapons, outrageous enemies, and intense co-op action. Explore a dangerous hidden planet Kairos as one of four new badass Vault Hunters.

Break free from the oppressive Timekeeper, a ruthless dictator who dominates the masses from on high. Now, a world-altering catastrophe threatens his perfect Order, unleashing mayhem across the plan
title: Borderlands 4 - Vex Gameplay Overview | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10014792

Flame Keeper is an action roguelite with a twist, where your life is your currency. Coming to PS5 on July 25th, 2025.

Flame Keeper is a dynamic action rogue-lite where your life is your currency. As a special little piece of burning coal named Ignis, you need to restore the fire to the Eternal Flame. But in doing so, you drain your own life. Find the perfect balance between progress and staying alive as you battle through a world of darkness and monsters. Learn from your mistakes as you die trying and adapt your tactics, skills, and abilities to progress. 

***

FIGHT LIKE YOU MEAN IT
Take on hordes of enemies using a multitude of moves and attacks, including punch combos, fiery dashes, wide area-of-effect stomps, and powerful finishers that deal decisive damage. Each biome in Flame Keeper is inhabited by unique foes and obstacles of increasing difficulty that you’ll need to learn to beat.

YOUR BUILDS, YOUR PLAY STYLE
In order to progr
title: Flame Keeper - Release Date Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/fortnite/

Only one can harness the Superman Call and wield Superman’s Flight, Heat Vision, and Super Punch to turn the tide of battle.

Starting July 11 at 9 AM ET, Superman’s Call crystal has a chance to spawn in every Battle Royale and Zero Build match. The first player to find it will be given Superman's powers, gaining the ability to fly through the air, melt structures with heat vision, and flex superhuman strength.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #fortnite
title: Fortnite - Superman: Look Up! Cinematic Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Prepare to enter the dark and brutal realms of Norse mythology in Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel - coming to PlayStation 5 on September 3rd!

This thrilling roguelike horde-survival game challenges you to fight relentless waves of enemies, earn powerful blessings from ancient Viking deities, and face off against colossal bosses in hostile, ever-changing worlds. Will you have what it takes to survive the hordes and become a true legend?

#ps5 #ps5games #jotunnslayer
title: Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel - Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games
